name: Anamnesis (itch)
description:
Anamnesis: n. recollection, especially of a supposed previous existence.

Anamnesis is a slice-of-life walking simulator that takes the player on a journey of rediscovering memories from their life through the senses.

 The game encourages the player to explore different environments and the visual and auditory experiences that come with them. It is a linear narrative-driven experience; however, the player can progress at their own pace.  

This game was designed by University of East London Students.

Producer - Ravina Sahota

Narrative Lead - Amber-Leigh Blake

Programmer - Abi Sanders

Programmer - Jordan Kemp

Level Designer - Jordan Clements

A special thanks to Liminal for allowing us to work with them and providing us with important research.
